title: SUMMONER SPELLS BUGGED? HELP!
body:
http://prntscr.com/g5rtau
http://prntscr.com/g5rto3
http://prntscr.com/g5rtsl

I AM IN A GAME RN WITH JUST IGNITE, NOTHING ELSE
I REINSTALLED ALREADY

replies.body: That's quite the issue! After the Reinstall of the client are your spells still bugged at this time, or are you good to go? Get back to me :)

Hey, any fix for this? My friend, Asiana Jones on the NA server is level 10 and has the same issue.  He only has 1 summoner spell on summoner's rift and cannot change it or the empty slot spell in champ select.  The empty one just shows as a blank box.  He made the account a long time ago, stopped playing, and just recently started playing again.  Reading around, it might have something to do with the removal of Clairvoyance.

No, I re-installed + did the client repair thing in the settings. 
I can't play ranked or draft.
When I play blind pick I can pick my summs normally. 
This bug just happened randomly one day, I have no idea how to fix it. I searched everywhere online and couldn't find anything.

When I am in game I only have Ignite, nothing else. My other summoner spell is just blank. I had to dodge 3 games so I don't ruin other peoples time.

I had the same issue and have found a fix for it

* Log into the game client
* Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
* Delete the folder named Config
* Go into a practice game and change both summoner spells.
* Leave game to sync settings

Thank you a lot it fixed my issue, i had to reinstall it twice and tried, nothing worked..
Cheers man!!!!
Same problem here, very old account, not played since years, Only 1 summoner spell :/ !
I have the same bug with the same conditions - made account a long time ago, stopped playing, and came back. Have empty box for second spell...
This bug is still in the game as of 29.9.2017 can't use the slot ( F ) at all it's blank
